FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.subtitle: Everything you need to know about working with us.

items.question: What is your typical project timeline?
items.answer: A typical MVP development project takes between 4 to 8 weeks, depending on the complexity of core features. We prioritize speed-to-market while maintaining high engineering standards.

items.question: Do you offer post-launch support?
items.answer: Yes, we provide various support packages ranging from weekly maintenance to dedicated monthly retainers to ensure your product continues to scale effectively.

items.question: Which technologies do you specialize in?
items.answer: We specialize in modern JavaScript frameworks (React, Next.js, Node.js), mobile development (React Native, Flutter), and robust cloud infrastructure (AWS, Docker).

items.question: How do you handle project management?
items.answer: We use agile methodology with weekly sprints and transparent communication. You'll have regular access to demos and progress reports through dedicated channels.

Contact.title: Let's build something amazing together
Contact.subtitle: Ready to start your next project? Reach out to us and let's discuss how we can help you scale your business.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp Chat

About.title: About Cuvatex
About.subtitle: We are a global team of engineers and designers dedicated to building high-quality digital products.

who.title: Who We Are
who.p1: Cuvatex is a software development agency specializing in web and mobile applications for startups and growing businesses. We combine technical expertise with a deep understanding of product development to create solutions that drive real business value.
who.p2: Founded on the principles of clarity, excellence, and partnership, we work closely with our clients to transform their vision into reality.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To empower businesses with scalable, high-performance digital solutions that accelerate growth and innovation.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become a trusted global technology partner for startups and companies building the next generation of digital products.

client.title: Client-Centric
client.description: Your success is our success. We build partnerships, not just projects.

quality.title: Quality Driven
quality.description: We never compromise on code quality, design, or user experience.

innovation.title: Innovation Focused
innovation.description: We stay ahead of tech trends to deliver cutting-edge solutions.
